charges.charge_description: 18:1344 and 2 BANK FRAUD. Bank Fraud; Causing and Act to be Done. (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to Fifteen (15) Months incarceration; Three (3) Years Supervised Release with conditions; Restitution in the amount of Seventy One Thousand Eight Hundred and Twenty-Three Dollars and Twelve Cents ($71,823.12); Fifty Dollars ($50.00) Special Assessment. (1)
